com.mapgroup.classificator.data

Class Attribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.data.Attribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContinuousAttribute, DiscreteAttribute

    public abstract class Attribute
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class which represents a generic (discrete or continue) attribute of the decision tree
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
